solution_line_template: If Harvey ran {harvey_more_miles} more miles, then he ran a total of {sam_miles} miles + {harvey_more_miles} miles = <<{sam_miles}+{harvey_more_miles}={harvey_miles}>>{harvey_miles} miles.
The two friends ran a total of {harvey_miles} miles + {sam_miles} miles = <<{harvey_miles}+{sam_miles}={total_miles}>>{total_miles} miles
